client.gui.customer

Class OrderTrackingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.gui.customer.OrderTrackingController

  • public class OrderTrackingController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the gui class of Order Tracking form. this class will contain and present the Home Heating Fuel orders of the customer. it will allow him to track his/her Home heating fuel orders.
    Version:
    final
    Author:
    Barak

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int currentOrderOpen
      Numbers of orders that open right now
      static java.util.ArrayList<OrderPane> orderPaneControllers
      Array list of order panes that will open and updated in dynamic way

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OrderTrackingController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean CheckIfOrderExists(java.lang.String orderID)
      This function will check in the order panes which OrderPane has the given ID returns boolean flag if its exist or not.
      com.google.gson.JsonArray getHHFOrders()
      This method will send to the server request to get the current Home Heating Fuel Orders of this user. it will insert the result to an array of the orders for any use.
      void load(javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneChange)
      this function load this pane
      void showAllOrders()
      This function will insert to the VBOX container all of the order Panes without any condition.
      void showOnlyOpenOrders()
      This function will insert to the VBOX container only panes of orders that their status is "WAITING" which means its still an open order.
      void showOrderByID(java.lang.String orderID)
      This function will insert to the VBOX container orders that equals to the given orderID param. it will be used in the "OnSearch" method up above.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getHHFOrders

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray getHHFOrders()
        This method will send to the server request to get the current Home Heating Fuel Orders of this user. it will insert the result to an array of the orders for any use.
        Returns:
        Json Array of the Home Heating Fuel Orders

      • showOnlyOpenOrders

        public void showOnlyOpenOrders()
        This function will insert to the VBOX container only panes of orders that their status is "WAITING" which means its still an open order.
